attributes.action: help force tougher laws on Gun, Knife, Drug and gang related crimes now!  society is scared !
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
laws in this country need to seriusly be inforced with immiediate effect when it comes to murder by knife,gun,drugs and gang related crimes.Other countries have death penalties etc.. we have death that is not controlled.This is becoming so frequent its scary.
There will be no future generation to pay for the running of the country
the way things are going.
Introduce National Service, inforce tougher sentences, make a stand and make a difference before society is out of your control.Dont let them  control us.Dont let them get away.
My heart goes out to each and every victim and their family.

R.I.P ben kinsella,shane thompson,danielle beccan shane miller,brendan lawrence,marian bates, marvyn bradshaw,john and joan stirland,donzal munn,omar watson to name but a few in my home town of Nottingham.

god bless

please help stop the killing and violence create peace and unity in a country where we can all say:
we are proud to live in england.

rejection.details: There are many similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=knife+crime&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=resign&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
